column2: "Kohri... Is it really safe here? We don't know if that monster could come out anywhere."
" Hitsugi, you can't hear it, can you..."
"\"Mother\" just told me everything! Why can't you hear her Hitsugi!"
"Like I said. That child's a traitor. \"Mother\" had forsaken and disowned her."
"You're!-"
"I shall introduce myself again, miss. I'm Hagith. Hagith Anie."
"Mother Cluster, Apostle of Gold. In other words, I'm Mother Cluster's Executive you can say?"
"Executive? Apostle of Gold? Wait!- The people chosen by \"Mother\" to manage [ESC-A] under \"Mother Cluster\"!"
"Only managing [ESC-A], you say? Of course there's more to that, right?"
"Right now, the whole world communication is funded by \"Ether\"."
"By utilizing Ether, it has allowed \"Mother Cluster\" to spread around the world. \"Mother Cluster\" is connected to the world."
"The only way to increase my company... Was, of course, from my development capabilities. Well, I wonder if it was convenient in many ways."
"From celebrities of large corporations and governments, members of \"Mother Cluster\" exists within. Do you understand what I'm saying?"
"With the power of \"Mother Cluster\", you can do anything. It'll be a piece of cake to take over a school. Even the world, at will."
"What's, up with that..! In other words, \"Mother Cluster\" has already dominated the world!"
"...You're wrong Hitsugi. It's not like that."
"\"Mother Cluster\" isn't dominating, it's supporting the world from behind-the-scenes."
"That's what \"Mother\" said. That's what \"Mother\" taught us."
"Kohri..."
"You're the one manipulating those monsters- Even Kohri..!"
"Woah- Don't get the wrong idea. I'm not manipulating Kohri at all."
"She's acting on her own. In response to her contact with \"Mother\", she's trying to save you herself. Isn't that right?"
"...Hitsugi. Please, hand over Aru without asking anything."
"If you do, \"Mother\" said she'll forgive you, Hitsugi... \"Mother\" always keep her promises."
"\"Mother\", is asking for Aru..? Why!?"
"That... Doesn't matter!!"
"Hitsugi, I beg you! Hand over Aru, and let's go back to our days as usual?"
"...Big sis... I'm scared."
"What \"Mother\" said..."
"What I've seen..."
"What I should believe..."
"Hitsugi... Why..."
"Really, I also wanted to know why too, in this situation. Although I thought I was being rational here..."
"Aru protected me when I was clueless about everything. I- can't just abandon him like that!"
"Time to back down Kohri. Your role is done here, leave the rest to me."
"Wait! Hitsugi's still being deceived by them! If we talk to her, she'll definitely understand!"
"Kohri!"
"That's enough of your student chit-chat. We're all talking business now, young lady. Business about my contact with \"Mother\"."
"My job is to bring that child, Aru, with me to where \"Mother\" resides."
"I'm the \"smooth-working\" type of person. Without having anything bothersome in my way, easy as fiddling with an app."
"A glowing... Tablet?"
"Heh, you can see it too. It's something that you can see, only if \"Mother\" gave you Ether Aptitude."
"This, is my Emerald Tablet. It gives me the ability to remodel, shape and control Phantoms under my command. My mass production army."
"It created all those monsters!?"
"Oh come on, up until now you thought that \"Ether\" was only used for communication purposes didn't you?"
"Ether's usage, in other words, fantasy implementations. If you seize the power of Ether, then it's easy to create my own army like this."
"Come... My army! Become my hands and feet, let's finish this job without wasting my energy."
"Is this... The end? Is this- where I'm going to be ended?"
"Without knowing, nor understanding anything... I'm only going to end up losing?"
"Big sis!"
"No. I'm not giving up. This time..."
"I'll protect you!"
"That weapon... Was materialized by hand!? In those last moments?"
"Haaa- haaah..!"
"I see, my job turned against me."
"We've already predicted this level of activity as irregular. It's my job to crush a \"Bug\" like you."
"...What's this reading? From... Above?"
"Wha-!"
